Title: pg_get_wal_replay_pause_state
Description: Returns recovery pause state. The return values are not paused if pause is not requested, pause requested if pause is requested but recovery is not yet paused, and paused if the recovery is actually paused.
EffectiveSQLsGeneratedErrors:
(psycopg2.errors.ObjectNotInPrerequisiteState) recovery is not in progress
HINT:  Recovery control functions can only be executed during recovery.
